content.p: Time to Reflect, Nick Afflatt, Lac d'Annecy, France #uongoingplaces we provide intensive tuition to enable Beginners students to make rapid progress we offer a wide range of modules on French and Francophone literature, history and contemporary politics, linguistics, cinema and visual culture Find out more about undergraduate study we can supervise your research on French and Francophone literature, French history and contemporary politics, linguistics, cinema, poetry and visual culture, critical theory, travel literature and contemporary and popular music. we have a supportive and welcoming community of research postgraduates in Modern Languages Find out more about postgraduate study Discover our research See more about members of staff in French and Francophone Studies, their research interests and areas of supervision.
